data.text:
East London at a glance

Background and Historical Information of the Area

East London, affectionately called Buffalo City by its locals, is located on the southeast coast of South Africa. In 1836, John Bailie, a settler from the 1820s, surveyed the mouth of the Buffalo River and founded the town hence the name "Buffalo City".

Area Serenity

East London is considered peaceful and beautiful. The city's rich history, cultural diversity, and stunning natural landscapes fill it with its unique charm.

Lifestyle

The lifestyle in East London is characterised by a perfect balance of coastal charm, outdoor adventure, cultural richness, and community spirit, making it an attractive destination for residents seeking a high quality of life in a picturesque setting.

Best Suburbs in East London

East London offers a variety of suburbs, from family-friendly neighbourhoods to more modern, established properties. Some of the desirable suburbs in East London include:

Abbotsford

Baysville

Gonubie

Stirling

Beacon Bay

Education

Schools in the area to choose from include Cambridge High School, Clarendon Primary School for Girls, Stirling Primary School, Clarendon High School for Girls, Dale College Boys' High School, and West Bank High School.

Safety

Like numerous other South-African cities, it is imperative to implement safety measures to guarantee the well-being of both you and your loved ones. It's also important to consider multiple sources of information. Additionally, by talking to current residents and 3%.Com Properties' Area Agents you can gain valuable insights into the safety of specific areas within East London.

Statistics

Let us look at the demographics of sellers and buyers by age in East London.

Sellers: +-30% of the city are aged 18-35.

Buyers: 47% are between the ages of 36 and 49.

Healthcare

East London has the following hospitals in the area:

Life East London Private Hospital

Frere Hospital Government Hospital

Life St. Dominic's Hospital Private Hospital

Life Beacon Bay Hospital Private Hospital

Shopping Centres

There are a few shopping centres such as Beacon Bay Retail Park, Markham-Vincent Park, Balfour Park Shopping Centre, and Hemingway Shopping Centre.

Restaurants

Attention all food enthusiasts! Explore a selection of restaurants in the area catering to a diverse range of culinary tastes.

Sanook Caf√© - Italian/American restaurant.

Grazia Fine Food & Wine - Italian/seafood.

Irana Indian Cuisine - Indian/Thai food.

The Cricketer - Steakhouse.

Cantina & Craft - Mexican

Distance from key points

East London Airport (ELS / FAEL) is located just 11 km from the city centre.

Franchisee - Agents

DLC Inc. is the owner of the 3%.Com Properties branch in East London.
